prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon with a robotic appearance and bright yellow accents.
Imagine a giant, bipedal creature covered in white with green and yellow details.
Show me an ancient Pokemon that resembles a powerful machine with arms.
Design a mythical being that is both imposing and benevolent, standing on two legs.
Generate a Pokemon with a striking color combination of white, green, and yellow.
I want a creature that embodies strength and resilience with a humanoid shape.
Make a Pokemon that is reminiscent of ancient constructs with a friendly demeanor.
